item.title: üôà Touch typing
item.description: Learning keybr.com | My "the touch typing trainer". Super-comfy minimalistic interface, I absolutely love it. Comprehensive statistics included. TypingClub Wide selection of programs to learn with comfortable excercises interface. Just good. Ratatype | Pretty intense excerises, with almost no error tolerance. Typing.com Just ok. There is a straightforward learning path here. typing.io Typing real code from OSS projects. TypingAcademy Touch Typing Study Flexing MonkeyType | Nitro Type Key Hero
